thread.title: Tiphanie Timmons
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Tiphanie Timmons

author: Tiphanie Timmons
title: Tiphanie Timmons
text:
Had a wonderful service today ...with Johnathon...he was very helpful an a great personality other one that helped out was Rodney good guy too!.. Will definitely be back for other tires soon. ..i was in an out ...thanks again to town fair tire staff in Springfield ma .
Thank you
